subject: Baseball
Fines (Penalties)
lead_paragraph: David Wright, plunked by a changeup from the Brewers’ Johnny Hellweg in the third inning, got up and walked off on his own, but was removed from the game as a precaution.
snippet: David Wright, plunked by a changeup from the Brewers’ Johnny Hellweg in the third inning, got up and walked off on his own, but was removed from the game as a precaution.
